bidTitle: Spot Repairs of Concrete Pavement Panels on Arterial Streets
description: REQUEST FOR QUALIFICATIONS (RFQ) NO. 25-05-0774 SPOT REPAIRS OF CONCRETE PAVEMENT PANELS ON ARTERIAL STREETS Sealed responses, subject to the terms and conditions of this RFQ, for the above-referenced professional service must be received by the Engineering Department of the City of Lake Jackson, at 25 Oak Drive, Lake Jackson, Texas 77566 by Wednesday, June 18, 2025 at 2:00 pm CST. Responses received after the specified time will be returned unopened. All necessary information and addendums may be obtained from the City website at https://www.lakejackson-tx.gov/323/Purchasing or from Civcast by searching “Brazoria County / City of Lake Jackson / RFQ 25-05-0774 Spot Repairs of Concrete Pavement Panels” at www.civcastusa.com/.
relatedDocuments: 25-05-0774 RFQ Concrete Spot Panel Repairs: https://www.lakejackson-tx.gov/DocumentCenter/View/9303; RFQ Public Notice (25-05-0774): https://www.lakejackson-tx.gov/DocumentCenter/View/9304; 2025-Bond-PCI-70: https://www.lakejackson-tx.gov/DocumentCenter/View/9305; Professional Services Contract Sample_wm (blank): https://www.lakejackson-tx.gov/DocumentCenter/View/9306
